document_data.name: Tower Tranquil
document_data.mainbody: '''Tower Tranquil''' was a mage's tower in the [[Dalelands]]. It stood just north of [[Oversember Vale]].
document_data.Location: Tower Tranquil stood atop the gateway to the cavern of the [[dracolich]] [[Rauglothgor]]. A ''[[gate]]'' once linked the tower to a cavern in [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.History:
Tower Tranquil was built by the [[mage]] [[Jhavanter]] of [[Highmoon]].

[[Shandril Shessair]] destroyed the tower in [[1356 DR]] with ''[[spellfire]]''.
